recipesJson.name: Gentlemen Jack Custard
recipesJson.author: shakenvape007
recipesJson.description: Highlighting Molinberry JD whisky in this simple  custard recipe. Using the whisky as a accent with its caramel, bourbon booze notes. Then layered with the fw graham, butterscotch and touch of brown sugar make this a pleasureful ADV.  Tune in and I hope you enjoy!! ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4K0ilJ01BAA
